review: I'm pleased with the new Fire TV box, it loads up Netflix and Amazon Prime videos much quicker than the blu-ray player I've been using.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I can't screen mirror on anything except a Kindle or Amazon Fire phone.  When they release an update that allows me to mirror my android phone (Galaxy S5) or my tablets I will change my rating to 5 stars.
author: Terry Parks
